name: Guise of the Wanderer
flavorText: Amidst the piles of bones, a gleaming suit of armor juts out from a tattered robe.
flavorTextHtml: Amidst the piles of bones, a gleaming suit of armor juts out from a tattered robe.
description: Provides transmogrification plans for Guise of the Wanderer themed armaments.
descriptionHtml: Provides transmogrification plans for Guise of the Wanderer themed armaments.
